name: a Horse for a Kingdom
description:
This is a non-complete prototype for testing.

You start with nothing except the horse you rode in on, he's seen better days, selling him may be the only option you have left. After all you are the last hope this kingdom has, can you bring back prosperity?

Movement: Arrow Keys

Action: Spacebar

This is a first, a lot learned, a lot left to learn. everyone needs to start somewhere.

Art: Mostly Kenny Assets with some tweaks. 

This was made as a last min (really should have joined sooner) entry for the Low Rez Jam. 

Thanks for checking this out.
